responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "4121008440867440484576BDA1823043", "An entity of unlimited power. True name is Malgus and it is a Djinn. Volton is imprisoned in the core of a sprawling global utopia. It was placed there by the gobbun species who siphon power from the false god to provide energy to the multitude of devices that support their society. It is theorized that the Djinn has been in existence since the 1A - 0. He has enough power to allow safe backwards travel for biological beings. Volton is secretly praised by an anarchist cult known as the Gaffers.")
name: MIDD_0015_AAV_ClockworkCodex_19
